description: Number of planted trees: all sub-rooted trees from any node are identical; non-root, non-leaf nodes an even distance from the root are of degree 2.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
Index entries for sequences related to rooted trees
Index entries for sequences related to trees
formula: a(n+2) = Sum a(k), k|n. Shifts left two places under inverse Moebius transformation.
mathematica: a[n_] := a[n] = Sum[a[k], {k, Divisors[n-2]}]; a[1] = a[2] = 1; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 60}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, May 15 2013 *)
prog: (Haskell)a007439 n = a007439_list !! (n-1)a007439_list = 1 : 1 : f 2 where   f x = (sum $ map a007439 $ a027750_row (x - 1)) : f (x + 1)-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 20 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: New description from _Christian G. Bower_, Oct 15 1998.
